resources.string: Input the temperature and choose the type of temperature

This Temperature Converter app allows you to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin easily. Built with Jetpack Compose, the app supports dark/light themes, bilingual support, input validation, and sharing converted results. 

This application is made for Assessment mobpro 1.
